author: Special Correspondent
text:
Mayor A.Jaya on Thursday inspected the progress of the construction of a minor bridge across the Virupachipuram vaical along Thennur High Road and instructed engineers to complete the work soon.

Accompanied by Commissioner M.Vijayalakshmi, City Engineers J.Srinivasan and S.Nagesh, she inspected the renovation of a building of the Corporation Middle School at Ukkadai.

She inspected the provision of facilities such as purified drinking water supply.

Special camps for receiving claims and objections under the special continuous updating of electoral rolls would be held in all polling stations across the district on Saturday.

As per the instructions of Election Commission of India, designated officers or booth level officers would be available at the polling stations to receive claims and objections.

Left over electors and those who have attained 18 years of age as on January 1, 2016, can apply for inclusion by submitting Form 6.

Forms for deletions, corrections and change of address within the same Assembly constituency can be submitted, Collector K. S. Palanisamy said in a press release.

Electors can apply online atwww.elections.tn.gov.inand through common service centres.
title: Mayor inspets bridge
